opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Irvin, Individually and on Behalf of Her Minor Child, Irvin v. Hydrochem Inc.

opinion:
543 U.S. 976

IRVIN, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF HER MINOR CHILD, IRVIN, ET AL.
v.
HYDROCHEM INC. ET AL.

No. 04-237.

Supreme Court of United States.

November 1, 2004.

1

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari denied. JUSTICE BREYER took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition. Reported below: 367 F. 3d 473.
